ABOUT US

OUR HISTORY

Global Glamping is a full stack concept to glampsite company that helps people smoothly enter the rapidly expanding glamping industry, expertly expand their current camp or glamp site, and make the most of this exciting community-based movement. We do this by offering the very best in glamping structures, coaching/consulting on best practices, brokering investment partnerships, and delivering innovative new technologies that promote meaningful community-driven interactions.

REVIEWS

1/3
KAMRY HARPE

My GG experience is always unreal! I’ve stayed in yurts and geodomes built by this company. Every one is unique in its own way with views that will take your breath away! You also will not find better hospitality than you will with the owner, Devon! Such a great guy with so much talent!

KARIN WEBER

What an amazing journey it has been with Devon and his team . From the beginning of our decision to work with Global glamping to the present , Devon and his team have been more than helpful . answering questions , site prep, set up and after care of our project !!

KAITLYN SCULLEY

I would highly recommend global Glamping for any of your Glamping needs. I’ve seen first hand the heart and dedication that goes into the work they do. The time and effort the entire team puts into creating something amazing. Don’t look anywhere else, you’ve found the best!
